Package main.controller.suggestion

Class SuggestionManager

java.lang.Object
main.controller.suggestion.SuggestionManager
public class SuggestionManager extends Object
The class provides methods for managing Suggestion list

  • Method Details

    • createSuggestion

      public static Suggestion createSuggestion(String msg, String committeeUserID, String staffID, String campID) throws UserAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a suggestion based on user inputs
      Parameters:
      msg - The message of the suggestion
      committeeUserID - The committee user ID associated with the suggestion
      staffID - The staff ID associated with the suggestion
      campID - The camp ID associated with the suggestion
      Returns:
      The created suggestion
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - If the suggestion already exists

    • getByID

      public static Suggestion getByID(String suggestionID) throws UserErrorException
      Gets a suggestion by ID
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - The ID of the suggestion
      Returns:
      The suggestion with the specified ID
      Throws:
      UserErrorException - If the suggestion is not found

    • getNewSuggestionID

      public static String getNewSuggestionID()
      Generates a new unique suggestion ID
      Returns:
      The new suggestion ID

    • updateAllSuggestions

      public static void updateAllSuggestions(List<Suggestion> suggestions)
      Updates the Suggestion list with the provided list of suggestion
      Parameters:
      suggestions - The list of suggestions to update.

    • deleteSuggestion

      public static void deleteSuggestion(String suggestionID) throws UserErrorException
      Deletes a suggestion from the list
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - The ID of the suggestion to be deleted
      Throws:
      UserErrorException - If the suggestion is not found

    • editSuggestionDetails

      public static void editSuggestionDetails(Student student) throws PageBackException
      Edits details of a suggestion from the list
      Parameters:
      student - The student making the edit
      Throws:
      PageBackException - If the user chooses to go back to the previous page
